page.title: 16Attitudes
page.content: Attitudes The majority of the residents of Muckhart,an area of scenic beauty and great landscape value,have either settled or stayed here from their own choice.Those who commute to more commercialised areas,some distance away,find peace and tranquility on their return.One stated"It is like going on holiday every weekend."Most residents have cars and are in a position to utilise the amenities which exist in neighbouring areas of the Central Belt.A strong community spirit exists.Involvement in the Britain in Bloom competition has enhanced the appearance of the village.Attitudes are against change and there is a general acceptance of the idea of conservation.
